titleStmt.title: Description of University of Pennsylvania Ms. Codex 361: Libro di crediti

notesStmt.note: Inscription on front cover: Jesus Maria 1496.
Heading f. [i]r: Nota de la posessione de viginaro / se ritrova fin adi primo aprile 1496 / tereno vidato et campivo pertiche 864 / prati pertiche 687.
Cover worn in places. Hole in front cover. Some stains and smudges.
Five small slips of paper, contemporary with the manuscript and containing figures, etc., have been laid into the manuscript. They are located between f. 88-89, 99-100, 103-104, 115-116, and 128-129.

msIdentifier.repository: Kislak Center for Special Collections, Rare Books and Manuscripts

msContents.summary: Accounts of an agricultural estate (of Jacobus Sanonus?). Includes personal accounts of various debtors, with an index of names.

supportDesc.extent: 142 leaves : 141 x 102 mm. bound to 152 x 101 mm
supportDesc.foliation: Paper, 142; [i], 1-23, [24-141]; contemporary foliation in ink, upper right recto; modern foliation in pencil, upper right recto.

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Written in a humanistic cursive script.

decoDesc.decoNote: Reused manuscript leaf, Inside front cover
Reused manuscript leaf, Inside back cover

binding.p: Contemporary vellum. Cover is a portion of a manuscript document on vellum, apparently written in Latin.
